name: Super Shiba
description: Super Shiba token is a community led project which provides the meme-token space with additional functionality and use-cases than all other dog-based projects. Super Shiba fosters a dedicated, passionate and rapidly growing community of crypto enthusiasts from all over the world, all with one common goal: to make Super Shiba the leading cute-dog-token in the crypto space. Super Shiba is a meme creation platform for users create their own memes in the form of NFTs. These 'NFMeses' are a way for meme creators to claim ownership of their creations, trade them in open NFT marketplaces, or just to show off to their peers. Super Shiba is also a completely unique NFT market place for NFMemes created on the Super Shiba platform. These are initiatives that define the Super Shiba community and its goals, and are fueled by the collective talents and passions of its vibrant and budding community
